Status.description: Development status of the country (Developed or Developing)

value_dict.Developing: The country is classified as developing based on socio-economic factors
value_dict.Developed: The country is classified as developed based on socio-economic factors

Life expectancy.description: The average number of years a newborn is expected to live, assuming that current mortality rates remain constant throughout their lifetime

Adult Mortality.description: Adult mortality rate, probability of dying between 15 and 60 years per 1000 population

infant deaths.description: Number of infant deaths per 1000 population

Alcohol.description: Alcohol, recorded per capita (15+) consumption (in litres of pure alcohol)

percentage expenditure.description: Expenditure on health as a percentage of Gross Domestic Product per capita

Measles.description: Number of reported cases per 1000 population

BMI.description: Average Body Mass Index of entire population

under-five deaths.description: Number of deaths under five years of age per 1000 population

Total expenditure.description: General government expenditure on health as a percentage of total government expenditure (%)

Diphtheria.description: Diphtheria tetanus toxoid and pertussis (DTP3) immunization coverage among 1-year-olds (%)

HIV/AIDS.description: Deaths per 1 000 live births HIV/AIDS (0-4 years)

GDP.description: Gross Domestic Product per capita (in USD)

thinness 1-19 years.description: Prevalence of thinness among children and adolescents for Age 10 to 19 (%)

thinness 5-9 years.description: Prevalence of thinness among children for Age 5 to 9 (%)

Income composition of resources.description: Human Development Index in terms of income composition of resources (index ranging from 0 to 1)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in public health analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the country demographics and health indicators, please predict the life expectancy.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted life expectancy is {answer} years.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in public health analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the country demographics and health indicators, please predict the adult mortality rate.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted adult mortality rate is {answer}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in educational analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the country demographics and health indicators, please predict the average years of schooling.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted average years of schooling is {answer} years.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in economic analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the country demographics and health indicators, please predict the income composition of resources.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted income composition of resources is {answer}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in public health analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the country demographics and health indicators, please predict the alcohol consumption per capita.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted alcohol consumption per capita is {answer} liters.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in economic analytics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the country demographics and health indicators, please predict the total health expenditure.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted total health expenditure is {answer}.
